text: Faris Odeh (3 December 1985 â€“ 8 November 2000) was a Palestinian boy from the Israeli occupied Gaza Strip who became known as a national icon for a photograph in which he is seen throwing a stone at an Israeli tank during the Second Intifada. == References == Category:1985 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Palestinian people Category:People from the Gaza Strip
title: Faris Odeh
